Title: COSMA VENUS AUTOMATIC SPREADING LINE
description: The Cosma Technology Venus Automatic spreader allows for accurate and quick spreading of any and every kind of material in the apparel automotive, upholstery, and technical textile industries. The VENUS 120 model is exclusive to spreading rolls or flat folds of sportswear, knitwear, and woven fabrics in open width or zigzag ways, while the VENUS 300model is dedicated to spreading Denim or other hard materials weighing up to 300 kilos.
